p.text: Welcome development environment Algorithm 2 ! Here you can create a program almost any complexity ! From you only required a little imagination and a desire to learn.

your first time here:
When you first run this development environment, then the best way to get acquainted with it will establish its first project step by step .

If you do not understand the main program:
The main window of the development environment, as well as other interface elements are described in detail in the section development environment Algorithm 2 .

If you do not understand how to work with any object or property:
All objects, including all their properties, commands and events are described in sections Objects and Useful sites .

problem associated with programming:
Try to find the answer in sections development environment , Programming , Auxiliary words .
